author: Alex Turner-cohen
title: Coronavirus: Infant under the age of one is youngest person to die from virus
description: Coronavirus: Infant under the age of one is youngest person to die from virus news.com.au
content: An infant who tested positive for the coronavirus has died in Chicago, USA, Illinois authorities announced yesterday. It was the first known death of a child younger than a year old with the virus in the United States, although the authorities in some states … [+634 chars]
